pullrequest.title: Quick fix for config errors after qtutils 2 changes

content.raw:
I usually add both of you manually but this time I wanted to get the fix in quickly (and couldn't just do it my self). I though the US would be up way before Australia so I just added you.

Could you name me the default reviewers of all repos so I can set them in to my forks? Or is it just always you and phil?
